Package us.teaminceptus.silverskillz.api.skills

Class SkillInstance

java.lang.Object
us.teaminceptus.silverskillz.api.skills.SkillInstance
public final class SkillInstance extends Object
Represents a Skill Instance from SilverPlayer#getSkill(Skill)

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel​(boolean basic, int level)
      Sets the level

      The progress will be the minimum for this level.

      Parameters:
      basic - Whether or not to use basic to convert to progress
      level - New level to set

      Adds progress
      Parameters:
      add - The amount to add
      Returns:

    • addProgress

      public boolean addProgress​(boolean basic, double add) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds progress
      Parameters:
      basic - Whether or not to use basic for converting to level
      add - The amount of progress to add
      Returns:
      true if leveled, else false
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if getProgress() + add is greater than Skill.MAX_PROGRESS_VALUE

      Removes progress
      Parameters:
      remove - The amount to remove
